text: Chernyliava () - a village (selo) in Yavoriv Raion, Lviv Oblast, in the West Ukraine (). The population of the village is 1745 people and Local government is administered by Chernyliavska Village Council. Чернилявська сільська рада == Geography == The village is located in the western part of the Lviv region near on the border of the Republic of Poland. It is at a distance from the regional center of Lviv, and from the district center Yavoriv. == History and religion == 1480 is considered to be founding date of the village. Село Чернилява: карта вулиць, фото The Men's Monastery in the 12th and 13th centuries has been in the village Chernyliava.
